verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> spake אֱלִיה֗וּ <WH453> Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> moreover and said
הֲ֭זֹאת <WH2063> you חָשַׁ֣בְתָּ <WH2803> Thinkest לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> thou this to be right אָ֝מַ֗רְתָּ <WH559> [that] thou saidst צִדְקִ֥י <WH6664> My righteousness מֵאֵֽל׃ <WH410> God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תֹ֭אמַר <WH559> For thou saidst מַה־ <WH4100> What יִּסְכָּן־ <WH5532> What advantage לָ֑ךְ מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אֹ֝עִ֗יל <WH3276> will it be unto thee? [and] What profit מֵֽחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <WH2403> sin
אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I אֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֣ <WH7725> break מִלִּ֑ין <WH4405> answer וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֶ֥יךָ <WH7453> thee and thy companions עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

הַבֵּ֣ט <WH5027> Look שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> unto the heavens וּרְאֵ֑ה <WH7200> and see וְשׁ֥וּר <WH7789> and behold שְׁ֝חָקִ֗ים <WH7834> the clouds גָּבְה֥וּ <WH1361> [which] are higher מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> than

אִם־ <WH518> If חָ֭טָאתָ <WH2398> If thou sinnest מַה־ <WH4100> what תִּפְעָל־ <WH6466> what doest בּ֑וֹ וְרַבּ֥וּ <WH7231> be multiplied פְ֝שָׁעֶ֗יךָ <WH6588> thou against him? or [if] thy transgressions מַה־ <WH4100> what תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> what doest לּֽוֹ׃

אִם־ <WH518> If צָ֭דַקְתָּ <WH6663> If thou be righteous מַה־ <WH4100> what תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> what givest ל֑וֹ א֥וֹ <WH176> Or מַה־ <WH4100> what מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> He יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> thou him? or what receiveth

לְאִישׁ־ <WH376> [may hurt] a man כָּמ֥וֹךָ <WH3644> like רִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <WH7562> Thy wickedness וּלְבֶן־ <WH1121> [may profit] the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> of man צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6666> as thou [art] and thy righteousness

מֵ֭רֹב <WH7230> By reason of the multitude עֲשׁוּקִ֣ים <WH6217> of oppressions יַזְעִ֑יקוּ <WH2199> they make [the oppressed] to cry יְשַׁוְּע֖וּ <WH7768> they cry out מִזְּר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> by reason of the arm רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> of the mighty

וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> no אָמַ֗ר <WH559> But none saith אַ֭יֵּה <WH335> how אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> Where [is] God עֹשָׂ֑י <WH6213> my maker נֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> who giveth זְמִר֣וֹת <WH2158> songs בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> in the night

מַ֭לְּפֵנוּ <WH502> Who teacheth מִבַּהֲמ֣וֹת <WH929> us more than the beasts אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וּמֵע֖וֹף <WH5775> than the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> air יְחַכְּמֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2449> and maketh us wiser

שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There יִ֭צְעֲקוּ <WH6817> There they cry וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יַעֲנֶ֑ה <WH6030> but none giveth answer מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> because גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> of the pride רָעִֽים׃ <WH7451> of evil men

אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely שָׁ֭וְא <WH7723> vanity לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ <WH8085> will not hear אֵ֑ל <WH410> Surely God וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> neither will the Almighty לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7789> regard

אַ֣ף <WH637> Although כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when תֹ֭אמַר <WH559> thou sayest לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תְשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH7789> thou shalt not see דִּ֥ין <WH1779> him [yet] judgment לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> [is] before וּתְח֥וֹלֵֽל <WH2342> him therefore trust לֽוֹ׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now כִּי־ <WH3588> because אַ֭יִן <WH369> has not פָּקַ֣ד <WH6485> But now because [it is] not [so] he hath visited אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> in his anger וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> yet he knoweth בַּפַּ֣שׁ <WH6580> extremity מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [it] not in great

וְ֭אִיּוֹב <WH347> Therefore doth Job הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> in vain יִפְצֶה־ <WH6475> open פִּ֑יהוּ <WH6310> his mouth בִּבְלִי־ <WH1097> without דַ֝֗עַת <WH1847> knowledge מִלִּ֥ין <WH4405> words יַכְבִּֽר׃ <WH3527> he multiplieth פ
